information.form_priority_helpText: Please enter an interger from 0 to 99. 0 is the highest priority.

change.new: Apply a price to selected products
change.decrease_fixed: Decrease a fixed amount of the original prices of selected products
change.decrease_percentage: Decrease the original prices of selected products by a percentage (%)
